document.full_text: "i was forced on stage at age two," says chaz bono, only child of sonny and cher, of life with the pop stars' during their heyday in the 1970s. "i looked retarded."
document.title: chaz bono transitions from chastity to his real self
lines_and_colors: "i was forced on stage at age two," says chaz bono, only child of sonny and cher, of life with the pop stars' during their heyday in the 1970s. "i looked retarded."
